p: GraphPad Prism software was used to analyze all data. Log 10 transformed titers used for plaque assays, and either Î² actin or Rp49 normalized viral RNA or tissue weight-normalized values were analyzed using one-way ANOVA and post-hoc Tukey test for multiple comparisons, where appropriate as indicated in figure legends. A p value of <0.05 was considered statistically significant.
